title.rendered: “Skills speak louder than Degrees” – Vaibhav Vats

content.rendered:
“Skills speak louder than Degrees”

 

The most widely read publication – The Times of India – has featured Digiperform in its weekly education supplement- Education Times, in its print & online edition on 7th May 2018.

The publication has carried authored article by Vaibhav Vats, Co-Founder of Digiperform on Skills over degrees, the new success mantra for millennials under the headline section ‘Skills speaks louder than degrees’.

 

Coverage Details:

Headline- Skills speaks louder than degrees

Publication-  Education Times-The Times of India

Edition- National (Ahmedabad, Aurangabad, Bangalore, Bhopal, Bhubaneswar, Calicut, Chandigarh, Chennai, Coimbatore, Delhi, Guwahati, Hubli, Hyderabad, Indore, Jaipur, Kochi, Kolhapur, Kolkata, Lucknow, Madurai, Mangalore, Mysore, Nagpur, Nashik, Panaji, Patna, Puducherry, Pune, Raipur, Ranchi, Surat, Trichy, Trivandrum, Varanasi, Vijayawada and Visakhapatnam)

Date- May 7th, 2018
